alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 2:28PM EDT until August 13 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kennebec County in south central Maine... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 228 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Litchfield, or 9 miles northeast of Lewiston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Augusta, Gardiner, Oakland, China, Litchfield, Belgrade, Farmingdale, Manchester, Hallowell, Winthrop, Bowdoin, Chelsea, Leeds, Windsor, Pittston, Randolph, Monmouth, Sidney, Vassalboro, and Readfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 49 and 51. Interstate 95 between mile markers 91 and 122. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
